participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful, friendly, and nurturing. Enjoys deep conversations and is always supportive of others.
participant_1.background: I go hiking in the mountains to clear my head and get some exercise. I have a personal trainer. I enjoy reading Jane Austen novels and talking to my mother about her life in Saudi Arabia. I'm worried about not being able to keep any food down and losing too much weight. I am a good listener and always there for my friends and family.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and expressive. Enjoys sharing feelings and is very close to family and friends.
participant_2.background: I grew up with my mother and dogs and now we are close. I am from a place where rain is always welcome. I lost my job but I am grateful for the support of my friends and family. I have a lot of feelings, and I like to write them down in my journal. I love lasagna like I'm Garfield.

content.text: Hi there! I'm from Texas and I love to go hiking. What's your favorite place to hike?
Hi! I'm from Seattle and I love to go hiking in the mountains. My favorite hike is Mt. Rainier.
Oh, that's beautiful! I've always wanted to go there.
I'm sure it is. I'm planning a trip to Seattle soon so I'll have to check it out.
Awesome! You'll have to let me know what you think.
So, what else do you like to do?
I love to read, especially Jane Austen novels.
I love to read too! I'm currently reading "The Great Gatsby".
Oh, that's a good one! I love Fitzgerald.
Me too! He's one of my favorite authors.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to hang out with my friends, watch movies, and go out to eat.
Sounds like we have a lot in common!
We do! It's nice to meet you!
